languages.text:
The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement range.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text:
The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g}.
This movement does not trigger attacks of opportunity.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a melee {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area{/g} attack with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement range.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement range.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

languages.text:
装备者可以耗费所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，移动到范围内的任何格子。
此移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
移动结束时，装备者会制动使用主手{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器，对邻近所有敌人发动{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement range.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text:
装备者可以耗费所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，移动到{g|Encyclopedia:Range}范围{/g}内的任何格子。
此移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。
移动结束时，装备者会制动使用主手近战武器，对邻近所有敌人发动{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}。

装备者可以耗费所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，移动到{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}范围内的任何格子。
此移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
移动结束时，装备者会制动使用主手{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器，对邻近所有敌人发动{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}。

languages.text:
Персонаж может потратить все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, чтобы переместиться на любую клетку в пределах дальности движения.
Это движение не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
По завершении движения персонаж автоматически совершает атаку основным {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}по области{/g}, поражая всех противников на соседних клетках.
languages.original_text:
The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement range.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Персонаж может потратить все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, чтобы переместиться на любую клетку в пределах дальности движения.
Это движение не провоцирует атаки по возможности.
По завершении движения персонаж автоматически совершает атаку основным {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}рукопашным оружием по области{/g}, поражая всех противников на соседних клетках.

Персонаж может потратить все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, чтобы переместиться на любую клетку в пределах дальности движения.
Это движение не провоцирует атаки по возможности.
По завершении движения персонаж автоматически совершает атаку основным {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}рукопашным оружием по области{/g}, поражая всех противников на соседних клетках.

languages.text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}すべてを消費して移動範囲内のセルに移動できる。
この移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を発動しない。
移動終了時、使用者は自動的に近隣の敵すべてに対して主要武器を使って{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を仕掛ける。
languages.original_text:
The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement range.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}すべてを消費して移動{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}内のセルに移動できる。
この移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を発動しない。
移動終了時、使用者は自動的に近隣の敵すべてに対して主要武器を使って近接{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を仕掛ける。

使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}すべてを消費して移動{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}内のセルに移動できる。
この移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を発動しない。
移動終了時、使用者は自動的に近隣の敵すべてに対して主要武器を使って{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を仕掛ける。

languages.text:
El portador puede gastar todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} para moverse a cualquier casilla que esté al alcance de su capacidad de movimiento.
Este movimiento no activa {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
Al final del movimiento, el portador puede realizar un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} automático con su arma principal contra todos los enemigos adyacentes.
languages.original_text:
The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement range.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text:
El portador puede gastar todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} para moverse a cualquier casilla que esté al {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g} de su capacidad de movimiento.
Este movimiento no activa {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
Al final del movimiento, el portador puede realizar un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} cuerpo a cuerpo automático con su arma principal contra todos los enemigos adyacentes.

languages.text:
Der Träger kann seine gesamten {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} verbrauchen, um sich zu einer beliebigen Zelle innerhalb der Bewegungs-reichweite zu bewegen.
Diese Bewegung löst keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} aus.
Am Ende der Bewegung führt der Träger automatisch einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} mit seiner Primärwaffe gegen alle angrenzenden Feinde aus.
languages.original_text:
The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement range.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger kann all seine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} verbrauchen, um sich zu einer beliebigen Zelle innerhalb der Bewegungs-{g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} zu bewegen.
Diese Bewegung löst keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} aus.
Am Ende der Bewegung führt der Träger automatisch einen Nahkampf-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} mit seiner Primärwaffe gegen alle angrenzenden Feinde aus.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur peut dépenser tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pour accéder à n'importe quelle case à portée de déplacement.
Ce déplacement ne déclenche pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
À la fin du déplacement, l'utilisateur lance automatiquement une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} avec son arme principale contre tous les ennemis adjacents.
languages.original_text:
The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement range.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur peut dépenser tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pour accéder à n'importe quelle case à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} de déplacement.
Ce déplacement ne déclenche pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
À la fin du déplacement, l'utilisateur lance automatiquement une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} en mêlée avec son arme principale contre tous les ennemis adjacents.

L'utilisateur peut dépenser tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pour accéder à n'importe quelle case à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} de déplacement.
Ce déplacement ne déclenche pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'sini harcayarak hareket menzili içindeki herhangi bir hücreye hareket edebilir.
Bu hareket, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez.
Takan kişi, hareketin sonunda ana silahıyla bitişikteki tüm düşmanlara karşı otomatik olarak bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir.
languages.original_text:
The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement range.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Takan kişi, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'sini{/g} harcayarak hareket menzili içindeki herhangi bir hücreye hareket edebilir.
Bu hareket, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez.
Takan kişi, hareketin sonunda ana silahıyla bitişikteki tüm düşmanlara karşı otomatik olarak bir {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir.
